author: Milo Rodriguez
description: Tangy citrus fruit and cognac smoothed with a hint of vanilla.
name: Angel's Share No.1
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Licor 43 (or other spiced vanilla liqueur)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR heaped spoon of orange marmalade with cognac in base of shaker until marmalade dissolves
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
